testcase.name: should call the next middleware if the session is found
should call the next middleware if the route doesn't need the session
should create a new session if the session id is missing
should get the session if the session id is found
should get the session and call next with the session error
should save the session on response end
should not set the cookie is session is missing
should not set the cookie if expires is missing
should only send secure cookies via https
